en: Kamala, what is the time now?
There are five persons in this room.

te: ఈ మూడు గడియారాలలో ఒకటి నాది, ఒకటి రమది, ఒకటి విజయది.
en: Among these three watches, one is mine, the other one is Rama's and the third one is Vijaya's.

te: ఆ రెండు గడియారాలలో ఒక గడియారం సుశీలది; ఇంకొక గడియారం ప్రభది.
en: In those two watches one is Susila's and the other is Prabha's.
It is one o'clock in this watch.
Rama's watch is running six minutes slow.
Mine is running one minute fast.
Vijaya's is running ten minutes fast.
Prabha's is running twenty minutes fast.
It is two o'clock in that clock.
That is running one hour fast.
It is running half an hour fast.
Now the correct time is 1:30, isn't it?
Are all of you studying B.A.?

te: ఒకరు బి.ఏ., ఒకరు బి.ఎస్.సి., ఒకరు బి.కామ్.
en: One is doing her B.A., the other B.Sc., and the third one B.Com.
The rest of the two are doing diploma.
Is this not the bus sheduled for 10:15?
When is the next bus to Guntur.
There is a passenger bus 15 minutes later.
There is an express bus after forty minutes.
Madam, what is the time now?
It was not Friday the day before yesterday.
The day before yesterday was Saturday.
What is the date in this month?

te: అయితే నీ పుట్టినరోజు ఎల్లుండి బుధవారమన్న మాట!
en: Then your birthday is the day after tomorrow!
And the day after tomorrow is Wednesday.
My birthday is on the day next to the Republic day.

te: అయితే మీ పుట్టినరోజు జనవరి ఇరవై ఏడో తారీకన్నమాట!
en: Then your birthday is on the 27th of January.
One is mine and the other is his.
